'''''To Walk The Horizon...?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|The Day the Sword Departs}}.

==Trivia==
* The achievement's Chinese name is derived from the idiom {{zh|读万卷书，行万里路|tl=read ten thousand books, walk ten thousand miles,}} which means to learn and experience as much as one can.
